typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as string,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as string,
		Date_Action_Closed as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as date,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as date,
		Date_Action_Closed as date,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalAudit
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalAudit derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Certification_Audit_Type_Code,Corrective_Action_Identified,Audit_Date,Audit_Classification,Corrective_Action_Due_Date,Date_Action_Closed)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Audit_ID = Audit_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code = Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Relation_Corrective_Action_Identified = Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Relation_Audit_Date = Audit_Date,
		Relation_Audit_Classification = Audit_Classification,
		Relation_Corrective_Action_Due_Date = Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Relation_Date_Action_Closed = Date_Action_Closed,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Certification_Audit_Type_Code,Corrective_Action_Identified,Audit_Date,Audit_Classification,Corrective_Action_Due_Date,Date_Action_Closed)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Audit_ID == Relation_Audit_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingAudit@NewAudit select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Audit_ID = toInteger(Audit_ID),
		Audit_Date = toDate(Audit_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date = toDate(Corrective_Action_Due_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Date_Action_Closed = toDate(Date_Action_Closed, "dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingAudit@(NewAudit, ChangedAudit, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingAudit@ChangedAudit derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID = Relation_Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as date,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as date,
		Date_Action_Closed as date,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Audit_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
